entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Island Story: 100 Days
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.79 â†’ Free [Free ~ $2.79]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

You are shipwrecked on a desert island. â–  Easy-to-Play â€¢ Tap to move and gather. â–  Survival â€¢ Eating only wild fruits will not fill your stomach. â€¢ Catch fish through a mini-game, or craft traps to obtain meat. â–  In-Depth Health System â€¢ Staying healthy is a constant challenge. â€¢ Manage a complex simulation including: Weight, Wounds, Hunger, Thirst, Energy, Body Temperature, Insect Bitesâ€¦ â–  Upgrade Your Camp â€¢ Gather resources to craft tools and build new furniture. â–  Dynamic Weather â€¢ Different weather can limit your movements and may disrupt your plans for the day. â–  Self-Sufficient â€¢ Discover how to grow crops and raise goats. Make your own bread from scratch. â–  Relaxation â€¢ Natural white noise. --------- Offline Play Â· Ad-Free

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Lara Croft: Guardian of Light
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game Unlockï¼š$9.99 â†’ $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Full Game Unlockï¼š$6.99

Application Description

READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported. TWO LEVELS FREE Play the first two levels of Laraâ€™s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase. === Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night. DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics. BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges. SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online. PICK UP AND PLAY â€” AGAIN AND AGAIN! Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level. TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad. === We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues. Supported iPhones: â€¢ iPhone XR and later â€¢ iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later Supported iPads: â€¢ iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later â€¢ iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later â€¢ iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later â€¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT Â© 2010, 2025 Crystal Dynamics group of companies. All rights reserved. LARA CROFT AND THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, THE GUARDIAN OF LIGHT, LARA CROFT, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, and the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Crystal Dynamics group of companies. Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

entry.title: Cat Flow - Kitty Focus Timer
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.29 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.29]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Yearlyï¼š$11.99
  • Monthlyï¼š$1.99
  • Moonnightï¼š$1.99
  • Skyï¼š$1.99
  • Forestï¼š$1.99
  • Lokiï¼š$0.99
  • Cocoï¼š$0.99
  • Luckyï¼š$0.99
  • Simbaï¼š$0.99
  • Tobyï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Do you love adorable cats? Want better focus and less reliance on your phone? Let CatBox cats accompany you, training your concentration and building disciplined habits, growing with you along the way! CatBox Flow is the second app in the official CatBox series. It's a cat-themed focus and meditation app that hopes to have cute cats by your side to help manage your time. In a scenified space, put down your phone and focus on what matters most. Companion-style Focus, where the cats stay with you and protect your time! Companion-style focus: â€¢ Take back control of your time while focusing. â€¢ Cats will stay with you and protect your time. â€¢ After 30 seconds, the gravity sensor will trigger a stop setting to help the cat guard your time. â€¢ Various cats are available for subscription and individual purchase! Scenified space: â€¢ Immersive, scene-based spaces with cats to focus on what matters. â€¢ Customize different times, scenes, and themes to build personal habits. â€¢ A wide range of scenes are available for subscription or individual purchase. Multidimensional data review: â€¢ Detailed focus data with the cats by your side to review. â€¢ Unlocking cats and scenes lets different cats protect different data for you. Master, put down your phone now and let the cats accompany you in focusing! Future Features: Deep focus mode Cat training system Privacy Policy & Terms of Use: https://nicolecat.com/cat/privacy.html https://nicolecat.com/cat/terms.html Contact Us If you're having fun, feel free to contact us anytime: support@nicolecat.com

entry.title: Cat Todoï¼šAI & Tasks & Reminder
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.29 â†’ Free [Free ~ $0.29]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Monthlyï¼š$1.99
  • 2025 Spring Lawn Themeï¼š$1.49
  • Yearlyï¼š$11.99
  • Luckyï¼š$0.99
  • Grey Themeï¼š$0.99
  • Calico Themeï¼š$0.99
  • 2025 Spring Flower Themeï¼š$0.99
  • Gizmoï¼š$0.99
  • City Night Themeï¼š$0.99
  • Siamese Themeï¼š$0.99

Application Description

CatBox Todo is a to-do app loved by cat lovers worldwide. It's a brand-new, minimalist to-do list application featuring lively and adorable cats and themes. Design Concept CatBox aims to provide users with a comfortable experience by having lively kittens accompany them. The cats will perform various daily actions and provide touch feedback, encouraging users like little helpers. The to-do design emphasizes a realistic portrayal of daily life with an ultra-minimalist design, focusing on core functionality and minimizing distractions. Features â€¢ Lively Cat Companionship: Cats will vividly accompany you throughout your day, not only encouraging you when you complete tasks but also showcasing fun moments like eating and sleeping, just like your friends. â€¢ Clear and Concise To-Dos: Use CatBox Todo to record important matters simply and directly. â€¢ Quadrant View for Better Focus: Prioritize and focus on important tasks with the four-quadrant view. â€¢ Widget Support with Thematic Changes: CatBox Todo supports the latest widgets and will change along with the chosen theme. â€¢ Adorable Cat Skins: Lively and adorable cat skins are available through subscriptions and individual purchases. â€¢ iOS 26 Adaptability: Utilizes Apple Intelligence for iOS 26 compatibility. â€¢ Apple Intelligence runs entirely on-device, delivering enhanced cat AI while maximizing privacy. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use https://nicolecat.cn/cat/privacy.html https://nicolecat.cn/cat/terms.html Contact Us If you're having fun, please feel free to contact us: support@nicolecat.com

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$99.99 â†’ $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$14.99
  • Pro Tier 1ï¼š$9.99
  • RadarScope Pro Subscriptionï¼š$9.99

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether youâ€™re scanning for a mesocycloneâ€™s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricaneâ€™s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radarâ€™s scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: â€¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany â€¢ 6-frame radar loops â€¢ Two built-in providers for radar data â€¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US â€¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia â€¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes â€¢ Inspector and distance tools â€¢ Color palette options for radar data â€¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration â€¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting â€¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL â€¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use â€¢ Support for widgets and complications â€¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: â€¢ 30-frame radar loops â€¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes â€¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada â€¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada â€¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions â€¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks â€¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US â€¢ Local storm reports in the US â€¢ Custom color palette support â€¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: â€¢ Everything in Pro Tier One â€¢ 50-frame radar loops â€¢ A third provider for US radar data â€¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive â€¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive â€¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive â€¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products â€¢ NSSLâ€™s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products â€¢ NCEPâ€™s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products â€¢ Surface observations â€¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US â€¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive â€¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps â€¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA â€¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates â€¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices â€¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Super Mega Lucky Box
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but donâ€™t forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

Driving Zone: Germany Pro - car game and street racing simulator without ads and limits. Drive with realistic physics and legendary german cars. In this game are presented cars prototypes of the German manufacturers: from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and luxury cars. Each car in the game has it's own technical specifications and engine sounds. Well detailed body and dashboard create the effect of full presence and realism. The game offers four unique tracks with different weather conditions. You can drive on high-speed highway, or go for a ride in the German town, which is particularly beautiful at night. If you are a real extreme racer, you should drive on winter track with dangerous icy road. You can choose the starting time of the day, that will change dynamically. You can also try driving on special race or drift track. Start the engine, press down on the gas and chase as quickly as possible. Earn points by overtaking traffic cars. Or go to the race track and try to pass it by shortest time for take maximum reward. Another mode is drift, where you can test your skills of drifting and earn points by fast and sharp skid angles. You will need points to open the new vehicles, modes and other features of the game. This racing simulator gives you the ability to choose the style of driving that can be quiet and safe or extremely dangerous racing. The abundance of settings allows you to customize a level of car physics realism, from arcade and simulation levels to the most realistic, as in the difficult racing simulator in which you will need to show your driving skills. Features: - No ads. - Modern beautiful graphics; - Car tuning and customization feature; - Realistic car physics; - Change the time of day in real-time; - 4 levels for street racing, many configurations of racetracks and drift tracks with different weather conditions; - First person view / Interior view / Cinematic camera; - Automatic cloud synchronization of your game progress. Warning! This game is quite realistic, but it is not designed to teach you how to street racing. Be careful and responsible when you're driving real car. Enjoy virtual driving in heavy car traffic, but please observe the traffic rules and be careful on real roads.
